alert.note: Alert for East Slopes Sacramento Mountains Below 7500 Feet; Otero Mesa; Sacramento Mountains Above 7500 Feet; West Slopes Sacramento Mountains Below 7500 Feet (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS El Paso (Southern New Mexico and extreme Western Texas)
info.headline: High Wind Warning issued March 29 at 6:14AM MDT until March 29 at 9:00PM MDT by NWS El Paso
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM THIS MORNING TO 9 PM MDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...West winds 35 to 45 mph with gusts up to 65 mph expected. * WHERE...For the Sacramento Mountains, the Otero Mesa, for parts of El Paso County and all Hudspeth County. * WHEN...From 10 AM this morning to 9 PM MDT this evening. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Strong winds will lead to hazardous travel conditions, especially along north/south roads and highways. Damage to structure is possible with the strong winds.
info.instruction: People should avoid being outside in during strong winds and blowing dust, especially near loose objects and around trees and branches. If possible, remain in your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Use caution if you must drive.

area.areaDesc: East Slopes Sacramento Mountains Below 7500 Feet; Otero Mesa; Sacramento Mountains Above 7500 Feet; West Slopes Sacramento Mountains Below 7500 Feet
